uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.util
Class AlignmentParser

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.util.AlignmentParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
FastaParser, NexusParser, PhylipParser
public abstract class AlignmentParser
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract supertype representing a sequence alignment reader. The reader will be constructed with no arguments, and populated concrete implementations of the parseFile() method. e.g.: 

AlignmentFileReader reader;
switch(guessAlignmentFormat){
        case(fasta): reader = new FastaFileReader();
        case(nexus): reader - new NexusFileReader();

        ...

        if(reader.parseFile(inputAlignmentFile)){
                this.invariantSitesIndices = reader.getInvariantSitesIndices()
                this.numberOfTaxa = reader.getNumberOfTaxa()
                ... 
                etc
        }
}

Author:
Joe Parker, Kitson Consulting / Queen Mary University of London
